description: Chihiro and her parents in the car, arriving at the tunnel. Then a pan of the bathhouse, then shots of Chihiro meeting Haku, seeing her father turned into a pig, asking Yubaba for work, carrying coal in the basement. Then shots of Sen and Rin, Sen leaving the door open for Faceless, looking at her farewell card with Haku, then Chihiro picking up coal, Faceless giving Sen bath tokens, the baby crying, and Sen exiting Kamaji`s basement.
